title: David Warner Joins Seattle Orcas for MLC 2025 Season
body: Veteran Australian opener David Warner is set to make his debut in Major League Cricket (MLC) with the Seattle Orcas in the league's third season, which begins on June 12, 2025. Known for his aggressive batting, Warner brings a wealth ...... read full story
summary:
* Key Player: David Warner, a veteran Australian opener, will make his debut in Major League Cricket (MLC).
* Team: Warner will play for the Seattle Orcas.
* Tournament Details: The third season of MLC is set to begin on June 12, 2025.

title: David Warner Joins Seattle Orcas for Major League Cricket 2025
body:
David Warner, a former opener for Australia, has signed with the Seattle Orcas for the 2025 Major League Cricket (MLC) season. This will be his first time playing in the USA-based T20 league.

The third season of MLC will start on June 12, 2025, and Warner’s addition gives the game more star power. Fans can stay updated on the latest MLC news and player performances through platforms like the Bpexch App, which offers real-time cricket insights and updates.

Warner is still one of the most sought-after T20 players in franchise leagues around the world, even though he quit international cricket in June 2024. He is currently captaining the Karachi Kings in the Pakistan Super League (PSL), which shows how good a leader he is and how good a batsman he is.

Warner’s Great T20 Career

Warner has played in 401 T20 matches and scored 12,956 runs at a very good strike rate of 140.27. Because he bats aggressively and has a lot of knowledge, he is a great asset to any T20 team.

Warner is still one of the best players in IPL history, even though he wasn’t sold in the IPL 2025 sale. With 6,565 runs in 184 innings, he is the fourth-best run scorer in the event. It was strange that he wasn’t in the IPL this year, but he quickly made a mark somewhere else.

How Well The Big Bash League (BBL) Did

Warner came back to the Big Bash League (BBL) as captain of the Sydney Thunder for the 2024–25 season. The Thunder made it to the finals with Warner’s leadership, and he scored 405 runs in 12 innings, which was second most in the event.

Dubai Capitals Wins the ILT20

Warner was on the team from Dubai Capitals that won the International League T20 (ILT20) title in February of this year. His hitting and experience in games with a lot of pressure were very important to their title run.

So Far on the Seattle Orcas’ MLC Journey

In the first season of the MLC (2023), the Seattle Orcas got off to a good start and won all of their games. In the end, though, MI New York beat them. The Orcas had a bad season in 2024. They came last and only won one of their seven games while Heinrich Klaasen was captain.

With Warner on board, there is hope for a change. If the Orcas want to get back to the top of the MLC, his ability to lead and hit the ball hard could be the missing pieces.

Schedule for MLC 2025 and Warner’s Availability

In 2025, the MLC season will last from June 12 to July 13. This will make for a month-long T20 show in the USA. The event will not happen at the same time as The Hundred as it did last year. Warner will be playing for the London Spirit in The Hundred. Warner can play in both games without any overlap, thanks to this schedule.

What Warner Brings to the Seattle Orcas: Powerful hitting; Warner is a game-changer because he can control power plays and center innings.

Leadership Experience: Warner will be very useful because he has led teams in the IPL, BBL, and PSL.

Winning Mentality: His track record of winning various T20 leagues (IPL, BBL, and ILT20) will serve as an inspiration to the Orcas team.

Global Fan Following—Warner’s appearance will bring in more viewers and get fans more involved with MLC.

To read More blog: Exploring Online Cricket ID and Online Betting ID on Amiribook

That’s it! A huge boost for MLC.

It’s a big deal for Major League Cricket that David Warner signed with the Seattle Orcas. His fame and skill on the pitch will help the league become more famous in the US. Warner will try to add another prize to his already impressive career when he takes the pitch in MLC 2025. Fans can expect fireworks.
summary:
**Main Points:**

* David Warner, a former Australian opener, has signed with the Seattle Orcas for the 2025 Major League Cricket (MLC) season, his first time playing in the USA-based T20 league.
* The third season of MLC will start on June 12, 2025, and will last until July 13, 2025.
* Warner's addition brings star power to the league, and his experience and skills are expected to boost the Seattle Orcas' performance.

**Background:**

* Warner has played 401 T20 matches, scoring 12,956 runs at a strike rate of 140.27, making him a valuable asset to any T20 team.
* He has a strong track record in various T20 leagues, including the IPL, BBL, and ILT20.

**Impact on Seattle Orcas:**

* Warner's leadership experience and powerful hitting ability are expected to help the Orcas, who had a disappointing season in 2024, finishing last with only one win in seven games.
* His winning mentality and global fan following are likely to inspire the team and attract more viewers to the MLC.
